trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows CheckBox.
trans-unit.target: 代表 Windows 核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Use a CheckBox to give the user an option, such as true/false or yes/no.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用核取方塊來授與使用者的選項，例如 true/false 或 yes/no。

trans-unit.source: The CheckBox control can display an image or text or both.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊控制項能夠顯示影像或文字或兩者。

trans-unit.source: CheckBox and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls have a similar function: they allow the user to choose from a list of options.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項有類似的函式︰ 它們可讓使用者可從中選擇的選項清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: CheckBox controls let the user pick a combination of options.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊控制項可讓使用者選取的選項組合。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls allow a user to choose from mutually exclusive options.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控制項可讓使用者可從中選擇互斥選項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> property determines whether the CheckBox appears as a typical CheckBox or as a button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>屬性會決定核取方塊是否顯示為一般的核取方塊或按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property determines whether the control supports two or three states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>屬性決定控制項是否支援兩個或三個狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property to get or set the value of a two-state CheckBox control and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> property to get or set the value of a three-state CheckBox control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>屬性來取得或設定兩個狀態的核取方塊控制項的值，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>屬性來取得或設定三種狀態的核取方塊控制項的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property will return `true` for either a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>屬性會傳回`true`已核取或是不定狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property determines the style and appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性決定的樣式和控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>，使用者的作業系統決定控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A> property is ignored and the control is displayed using the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> alignment.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A>屬性會被忽略，控制項會顯示使用<xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>對齊。</xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A> property is set to one of the right alignments, the control is displayed using the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> alignment; otherwise, it is displayed using the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> alignment.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A>屬性設定為其中一個向右對齊、 使用顯示控制項<xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>對齊; 否則它就會顯示使用<xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>對齊。</xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following describes an indeterminate state: You have a CheckBox that determines if the selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is bold.
trans-unit.target: 以下描述為未決狀態︰ 您必須決定是否核取方塊中選取的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>為粗體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: When you select text you can click the CheckBox to bold the selection.
trans-unit.target: 當您選取文字時，您可以按一下要以粗體顯示選取項目核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you select some text, the CheckBox displays whether the selected text is bold.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當您選取一些文字，核取方塊，顯示選取的文字是粗體。

trans-unit.source: If your selected text contains text that is bold and normal, the CheckBox will have an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選取的文字包含文字是粗體和一般，核取方塊，必須為未決狀態。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> is instantiated, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AutoCheck%2A> is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> is set to `false`, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>具現化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AutoCheck%2A>設為`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>設`false`，且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AutoCheck%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that determines the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定外觀<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If Appearance value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> has a typical appearance.
trans-unit.target: 如果外觀值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>具有一般外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to `Button`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> appears like a toggle button, which can be toggled to an up or down state.
trans-unit.target: 如果值設定為`Button`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>會像是切換按鈕，可以切換為開啟或關閉狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> values and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>'s appearance are automatically changed when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<> *> 或<> *> 值和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>的外觀會自動變更時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: If AutoCheck is set to false, you will need to add code to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> values in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoCheck 設為 false 時，您必須新增程式碼以更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*> value or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> value and the appearance of the control are automatically changed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<> *> 值或<> *> 值和控制項的外觀會自動變更上<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>事件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal and vertical alignment of the check mark on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定上的核取記號的水平和垂直對齊方式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleLeft" name="MiddleLeft" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleLeft" name="MiddleLeft" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is in the checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>處於選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: When the value is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> portion of the control displays a check mark.
trans-unit.target: 當這個值是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項部分會顯示核取記號。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> property is set to `Button`, the control will appear sunken when Checked is `true` and raised like a standard button when `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>屬性設定為`Button`，控制項將會出現下凹勾選是`true`並引發當做標準按鈕時`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is in the checked state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>中核取狀態，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the Checked property will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for either a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Indeterminate" name="Indeterminate" href=""></xref><xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<> *> 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，已檢查的屬性會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>針對<xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Indeterminate" name="Indeterminate" href=""> </xref> <> </> *>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property is set to `false`, the CheckState property value can only be set to `CheckState.Indeterminate` in code and not by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>屬性設定為`false`，已核取 CheckState 屬性值只能設定為`CheckState.Indeterminate`程式碼中，而不是由使用者互動。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance?displayProperty=fullName> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control in its different states for the `Normal` and `Button` style control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance?displayProperty=fullName>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>其不同狀態的控制項`Normal`和`Button`樣式控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: |CheckState|Appearance.Normal|Appearance.Button| |----------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| |`Checked`|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> displays a check mark.|The control appears sunken.| |`Unchecked`|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> is empty.|The control appears raised.| |`Indeterminate`|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> displays a check mark and is shaded.|The control appears flat.|
trans-unit.target: |已核取 CheckState |Appearance.Normal|Appearance.Button| |----------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| |`Checked`|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>顯示核取記號。 |控制項下凹。 | |`Unchecked`|是空的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>。 |該控制項會出現引發。 | |`Indeterminate`|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>顯示核取記號，並會加上陰影。 |該控制項會出現一般。 |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的協助工具物件，以便<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有明確呼叫 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它會呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>參考屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckBoxAccessibleObject> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckBoxAccessibleObject>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckBoxAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref>包含必要的建立參數時在建立控制項之控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default size.
trans-unit.target: 預設大小。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumerations are set to false for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>列舉型別會設為 false<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項，以及不會引發事件 DoubleClick。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bits are set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>樣式位元會設為`false`如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項，並不會引發事件 MouseDoubleClick。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AppearanceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AppearanceChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnAppearanceChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAppearanceChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCheckedChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckStateChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: OnCheckStateChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property is set to `true`, subsequent clicks of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> will result in OnClick cycling through all the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>屬性設定為`true`，後續的按一下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>OnClick 逐一處理所有的值將會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>列舉型別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, OnClick switches between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，OnClick<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>和</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>模式間切換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the OnMouseUp event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 OnMouseUp 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被呼叫要讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法通常會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ```的預設實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只會傳回`false`來表示控制項具有沒有助憶鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字元當成助憶鍵處理的控制。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字的對齊方式上<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>將允許三種核取狀態而非兩種。

trans-unit.source: If the ThreeState property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> property value can only be set to the `Indeterminate` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> in code and not by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ThreeState 屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>屬性值只能設定為`Indeterminate`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>程式碼中，而不是由使用者互動。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is able to display three check states; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>可以顯示三個核取狀態，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表目前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that states the control type and the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 字串，這個字串會說明的控制項類型和狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>
